title: eventsQueueInput
description: A raw event inserted into the queue, waiting to be processed

id.description: The unique identifier for an event.

createdAt.description: The date the event was first received by the api.

userAgent.description: The user agent that originated the event.

s.description: The site id the event is coming from.

t.description: The event type: click, cms, form, keyboard, view.

p.description: The path (e.g /pricing) the event originated from.

c.description: The css class(es) of the html element interacted with.

i.description: The css id(s) of the html element interacted with.

va.description: Any value attached to the event. E.g the value of a html input.

v.description: The ID of the visitor creating the event

f.description: The form stage. Progresses as the user interact with the form.

is.description: The CMS item slug. This is provided by the user with the css class 'nocodelytics-list-item'.

cl.description: The index position of HTML element for the CMS list.

ci.description: The index position of HTML element for the CMS item.

d.description: The domain the event is coming from

ip.description: The ip address that originated the event.
